author: Shraddha Sharma
title: Bitcoin: VanEck Records Fund Growth, Foresees Strong 2024
text: Asset manager VanEck has a bullish outlook for Bitcoin and the broader crypto market in 2024. The investment firm described Bitcoin as the ‚Äúscreaming buy‚Äù for the upcoming year as its fund recorded growth. The comments come as the firm‚Äôs VanEck Digital Transformation ETF (DAPP) surpassed $100 million in assets under management (AUM), with VanEck‚Äôs global crypto-linked assets nearing $1 billion. 2024: A Promising Year Matthew Sigel, Head of Digital Assets Research at VanEck, noted DAPP‚Äôs impressive 2023 performance with over 300% gains. Sigel said that it was driven by key players like Coinbase and Bitcoin miners. Sigel anticipates 2024 to be another robust year, especially if Bitcoin reaches new highs, aided by the Bitcoin halving event, a more relaxed stance from the U.S. Federal Reserve, and continued adoption of crypto in emerging markets. The fund manager highlights that [Coinbase](https://coingape.com/coinbase-and-top-crypto-companies-increase-us-political-donations/), a significant component of DAPP, has shown sustainable market share growth. Notably, the exchange recently announced a 10x leverage cap on perpetual futures for major cryptocurrencies, aiming to enhance market stability. The Nasdaq-listed exchange is also actively involved in Washington. Recently, it refuted allegations by Senator Elizabeth Warren regarding employing a ‚Äú [revolving door](https://coingape.com/coinbase-counters-senator-warrens-revolving-door-allegation/)‚Äù tactic with former legislators to bypass regulatory measures. Recommended Articles Bitcoin remains the market star Jan van Eck, CEO of VanEck, highlighted crypto as the investment market‚Äôs most exciting segment. VanEck, one of the first few to apply for a Bitcoin-related ETF, predicts a breakout year for Bitcoin and crypto in 2024. The executive also underlined that the introduction of a spot ETF in the U.S. is among the top catalysts for this surge. In the [past](https://twitter.com/vaneck_us/status/1732811847076573388?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1732811896191909895%7Ctwgr%5Eced982beac5d8f1a7fb8e514b5e29cf74e49fc89%7Ctwcon%5Es2_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hindustantimes.com%2Ftrending%2F2024-crypto-predictions-heres-what-experts-are-saying-101703698843376.html), VanEck made a prediction about 2024 that included the onset of the U.S. recession alongside the launch of the first spot Bitcoin ETF, potentially attracting over $2.4 billion in investments in Q1 2024. The firm also foresees minimal disruption from April‚Äôs halving event. Meanwhile, VanEck predicts an all-time high for Bitcoin in Q4 2024, possibly driven by political events and regulatory changes post the U.S. presidential election. author: VNExplorer
title: Chelsea titan who won 11 duels was Pochettino's true hero over Gusto vs Palace
text:
Chelsea titan who won 11 duels was Pochettino‚Äôs true hero over Gusto vs Palace
Chelsea got back to winning ways on Wednesday night as they secured a 2-1 victory over Crystal Palace at Stamford Bridge in the Premier League.
The Blues took the lead through Mykhaylo Mudryk in the first half as the Ukraine international converted from close range but Michael Olise smartly equalised with a near post finish just before the break.
Mauricio Pochettino‚Äôs side then sealed the win late on as a VAR review awarded them a penalty for a foul on Noni Madueke, who stepped up to convert the spot-kick.
Malo Gusto put in a fantastic display at right-back, and left-back later on in the game, but the manager‚Äôs true hero on the night was central midfielder Moises Caicedo.
Malo Gusto‚Äôs performance against Palace in numbers Lee Dixon hailed his performance as ‚Äúsuperb‚Äù during the Amazon Prime live coverage of the match and it was a fair analysis of the talented gem‚Äôs showing.
The French dynamo, who started the clash on the right back of the back four, played a pivotal role in the opening goal with a fantastic turn on the half-way line before racing forward all the way to the left wing to slot a perfect pass to Mudryk to make it 1-0.
He made two key passes in total and completed 94% (91/97) of his attempted passes throughout his 90 minutes on the pitch, on the right and the left.
It was, however, a mixed bag from Gusto on the defensive side of the game. The full-back did make three tackles and three interceptions but was also dribbled past four times and lost eight of his 13 ground duels.
Whereas, Caicedo was impressive in and out of possession throughout the match for Chelsea as he showcased his quality in the middle of the park.
Caicedo‚Äôs performance against Palace in numbers The summer signing from Brighton & Hove Albion set his stall out early with a couple of crunching challenges and kept that tempo up all night.
He won an outstanding 11 of his 15 physical contests throughout the clash, which included nine of his 13 ground duels and both of his aerial contests.
The 22-year-old battler made five tackles and one interception in total and was only dribbled past once by an opposition player in midfield.
23/24 Premier League
Caicedo (via Sofascore)
Appearances
16
Sofascore rating
6.98
Pass accuracy
92%
Duel success rate
54%
Ball recoveries per match
4.8
His defensive statistics show that the Ecuador international was imperious for Pochettino to ensure that he cut out promising Palace attacks at source to win back possession for Chelsea, which then allowed them to control the game.
Caicedo also remained reliable on the ball to go along with his superb defending. The young whiz completed 94% (79/84) of his attempted passes from 102 touches of the ball and found a teammate with all five of his long passes.
This shows that the former Seagulls star was composed in possession and rarely gave the ball away cheaply to the opposition, which allowed Chelsea to constantly probe and cause problems at the top end of the pitch.
Therefore, Caicedo was Pochettino‚Äôs true hero on the night, over Gusto, as he used his skills on and off the ball to produce a complete display in midfield.

author: Press Trust of India
title: India records warmest October since 1901; No sign of winter in November
text: India experienced its warmest October since 1901 with a mean temperature recording 1.23 degrees Celsius above normal.

author: @infoitsport
title: Speed skating, Francesca Lollobrigida festeggia il bronzo agli Europei 2024 con il piccolo Tommaso - VIDEO (tlxj)
text: Speed skating, Francesca Lollobrigida festeggia il bronzo agli Europei 2024 con il piccolo Tommaso - VIDEO Una medaglia che rimarr√† nel cuore. Francesca Lollobrigida ci sperava in questi Europei 2024 di speed skating di Heerenveen (Paesi Bassi) di tornare sul podio dopo l‚Äôanno di stop e l‚Äôessere diventata mamma. La pattinatrice romana ce l‚Äôha fatta, ha vinto il bronzo nell‚Äôamata Mass Start e concluso alla grande un ritorno alle competizioni di alto livello. S√¨, perch√© Francesca prima di questa medaglia aveva messo in fila una serie di grandi prestazioni: i due quarti posti nel Team Pursuit e nei 1500 metri, sfiorando il podio nella prima circostanza, e il quinto posto nei 3000 metri. [(OA Sport)](https://www.oasport.it/2024/01/speed-skating-francesca-lollobrigida-festeggia-il-bronzo-agli-europei-2024-con-il-piccolo-tommaso-video/) Se ne √® parlato anche su altri media Il segreto per aver successo risiede nell‚Äôinsana voglia di andare oltre e di credere fermamente nel raggiungimento dei propri traguardi. A sette mesi dall‚Äôessere diventata mamma, la pattinatrice nostrana ha vinto il bronzo nella Mass Start degli Europei 2024 di speed skating a Heerenveen (Paesi Bassi). [(OA Sport)](https://www.oasport.it/2024/01/speed-skating-limpresa-di-francesca-lollobrigida-a-heerenveen-sul-podio-agli-europei-a-sette-mesi-dal-parto/) La seconda giornata della quarta edizione degli Europei su singole distanze di speed skating, in corso ad Heerenveen, nei Paesi Bassi, porta in dote all‚ÄôItalia l‚Äôundicesima medaglia nella manifestazione: sul mitico ovale di ghiaccio neerlandese della Thialf Arena, nei 5000 metri Davide Ghiotto conquista l‚Äôargento. [(OA Sport)](https://www.oasport.it/2024/01/speed-skating-davide-ghiotto-dargento-sui-5000-lollobrigida-ai-piedi-del-podio-sui-1500/) 7 121 Veronica Luciani ITA 1:59.47 PB +5.99 8 137 Aurora Grinden L√∏v√•s NOR 1:59.99PB +6.51 [(OA Sport)](https://www.oasport.it/2024/01/live-speed-skating-europei-2024-in-diretta-ghiotto-sfida-roest-nei-5000-metri/) La seconda giornata degli Europei 2024 su singole distanze di speed skating ad Heerenveen (Paesi Bassi) riserva all‚ÄôItalia, sul mitico ovale di ghiaccio neerlandese della Thialf Arena, nella gara dei 5000 metri uomini, la piazza d‚Äôonore di Davide Ghiotto, che bissa cos√¨ l‚Äôargento ottenuto ieri nel team pursuit. [(OA Sport)](https://www.oasport.it/2024/01/speed-skating-davide-ghiotto-conquista-largento-sui-5000-agli-europei-oro-a-patrick-roest/) Il pattinatore trentino (foto ANSA) ha chiuso la sua gara con il tempo di 6:08.27, tagliando il traguardo con un ritardo di +2.34 rispetto al padrone di casa Patrick Roest (oro con 6:05.93). Sul ghiaccio della Thialf Arena di Heerenveen (Olanda), infatti, l‚Äôazzurro ha vinto la medaglia d‚Äôargento sulla distanza dei 5.000 metri. [(CONI)](https://www.coni.it/it/news/22626-davide-ghiotto-splende-agli-europei-di-heerenveen-medaglia-d-argento-sui-5-000-metri.html) 17.46 La nostra Diretta LIVE si chiude qui, noi di OA Sport vi ringraziamo e vi auguriamo un felice proseguimento di serata. 17.43 Ci si aspettava sicuramente di pi√π da Andrea Giovannini nella mass start, specialit√† che lo vede in testa a tutti nella classifica di Coppa del Mondo. [(OA Sport)](https://www.oasport.it/2024/01/live-speed-skating-europei-2024-in-diretta-giovannini-punta-al-colpaccio-nella-mass-start/)

author: SHAFIQ NAJIB
title: Patrick Mahomes says his pregnant wife, Brittany, is due 'any day now'
text:
Patrick Mahomes says his pregnant wife, Brittany, is due ‚Äòany day now‚Äô SHAFIQ NAJIB Thu, December 26, 2024 at 10:20 PM UTC 2 min read
Patrick Mahomes is sharing an exciting update on his pregnant wife Brittany Mahomes .
The Kansas City Chiefs quarterback revealed that the newest addition to his family will be due "any day now" in an interview with Netflix Sports. The video streaming platform posted a clip of the exchange on X on Christmas Day.
Brittany Mahomes shares pregnancy symptom she's struggling with in 3rd pregnancy
Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement "Brittany says I've been stressing her out too much this season," the athlete said in the clip. ‚ÄúSo I got to try to not put so much stress on her through these football games.‚Äù
He continued, "Hopefully God works the right way and we can have that baby on ‚Äòthe bye‚Äô week somewhere, and then everything will work out perfectly.‚Äù
PHOTO: In this Nov. 10, 2024, file photo, Patrick Mahomes of the Kansas City Chiefs fist bumps his son, Bronze, while his wife and daughter, Brittany and Sterling, watch at Arrowhead Stadium in Kansas City, Missouri. (Jamie Squire/Getty Images, FILE) The Mahomes -- who are already parents to a daughter, Sterling Skye, 3 years old, and a son, Bronze, who is 2 -- announced that they were expecting their third child with a joint Instagram post on July 12.
The video at the time featured the family with the caption, "Round three, here we come."
Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement Later that month, the couple announced the sex of their third baby on with a sweet video posted to Instagram.
"Baby Mahomes #3 is a‚Ä¶.üíôü©∑," read the caption of the post at the time which showed Mahomes‚Äô daughter, Sterling Skye, playing a game of tic-tac-toe for the reveal.
PHOTO: In this June 13, 2024, file photo, Brittany and Patrick Mahomes arrive on the red carpet prior to the Kansas City Chiefs Super Bowl Ring Ceremony at the Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art, in Kansas City, Missouri. (Fernando Leon/Getty Images, FILE) With three pink X's in a row, the game concluded with pink smoke and matching confetti filling the air, confirming that the Mahomes family would be welcoming another baby girl.
Speaking to Sports Center during his Christmas Day game against the Pittsburgh Steelers, Patrick Mahomes revealed his one goal heading into the match.
Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement More in Celebrity Paris Hilton Leaves Little to Unwrap in NSFW Holiday Video Set to Ariana Grande‚Äôs Christmas Hit: Watch Billboard 19 People Who Died Thinking They Took Their Secrets To The Grave...Only To Be Revealed After Their Death BuzzFeed Kendall Jenner‚Äôs Christmas Eve Dress Comes With a Quirky Cutout Reality Tea Dear Abby: My wife hates my family but my brothers need a place to stay NY Post "I told my pregnant wife I was gonna get her the number one seed so we can go have that baby," he said. "So we got that number one seed."

author: Guardian Nigeria
title: TNL commits to green initiative, plans three EVs
text: Toyota Nigeria Limited (TNL) has announced plans to roll out three electric vehicles (EVs) in the next three years as part of its support for the government‚Äôs green deal initiative. Managing Director of TNL, Kunle Ade-Ojo, disclosed this while speaking with journalists at the maiden edition of the Toyota Motor Show organised by the TNL. He said Toyota hybrid electric vehicles would be unveiled in Nigeria soon as Cross, RAV4 and Land Cruiser Prado. Ade-Ojo said: ‚ÄúBy the end of this year, we will be introducing our first hybrid electric vehicle, Toyota Cross. Next year, we will introduce the RAV4

author: Marta Leite Ferreira
title: Falta de neve est√° a amea√ßar a sobreviv√™ncia das est√¢ncias de esqui na Europa | Altera√ß√µes clim√°ticas | P√öBLICO
text: Falta de neve est√° a amea√ßar a sobreviv√™ncia das est√¢ncias de esqui na Europa Altera√ß√µes clim√°ticas est√£o a provocar granizo e chuvas fortes, mas n√£o neva. H√° est√¢ncias de esqui na Europa sem capacidade para funcionar em pleno. Atletas querem mais ac√ß√£o clim√°tica. As est√¢ncias de esqui est√£o a sofrer as consequ√™ncias das [altera√ß√µes clim√°ticas](https://www.publico.pt/2023/08/18/azul/noticia/viver-alteracoes-climaticas-tempo-real-2060609), com a chuva e o granizo a substituir a queda de neve nos destinos tur√≠sticos mais procurados na Europa. √â a confirma√ß√£o de um aviso que surgiu num estudo publicado em Agosto pela [revista Nature](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41558-023-01759-5#author-information), de que 53% das 28 est√¢ncias europeias investigadas pelos cientistas estavam em risco muito elevado de registar uma escassez de neve caso a temperatura m√©dia global aumente 2 graus Celsius em rela√ß√£o aos n√≠veis pr√©-industriais. O [turismo de neve nos Alpes](https://www.publico.pt/2023/09/21/fugas/noticia/estancia-esqui-encerra-permanentemente-falta-neve-alpes-franceses-2064033), por exemplo, est√° avaliado em mais de 27 mil milh√µes de euros, mas o mercado deve registar uma quebra este ano, conta um artigo do [The Guardian](https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2023/dec/26/ski-resorts-battle-for-a-future-as-snow-declines-in-climate-crisis). Duas est√¢ncias de esqui em Fran√ßa, em Morzine e Les Gets, s√≥ puderam abrir na totalidade a 23 de Dezembro, dois dias antes do Natal e a √©poca onde se regista uma maior aflu√™ncia de turistas ‚Äî tudo porque [choveu intensamente nos √∫ltimos dias](https://www.publico.pt/2023/06/28/azul/noticia/chuva-vai-ameaca-maior-montanhas-aquecimento-global-2054853), mas nevou pouco. A queda de pequenas quantidades de neve pode ser suficiente para manter em funcionamento algumas est√¢ncias de esqui mais pequenas, mas pode [ficar aqu√©m da neve necess√°ria em est√¢ncias com pistas maiores](https://www.publico.pt/2023/01/06/azul/noticia/janeiro-quente-so-neve-artificial-mantem-esqui-vivo-partes-suica-2034011). A produ√ß√£o artificial de neve traz dificuldades acrescidas por ser mais cara, consumir muita energia e muita √°gua, refere a not√≠cia do di√°rio brit√¢nico. Com ela, a quantidade de est√¢ncias europeias com risco elevada de perda de cobertura de neve desce para metade (27%) com um aumento da temperatura m√©dia global de 2¬∫C acima dos n√≠veis pr√©-industriais. Mas o consumo de √°gua pode ser nove vezes superior at√© 2100 nos Alpes franceses. Os atletas profissionais est√£o preocupados com o impacto das altera√ß√µes clim√°ticas nas est√¢ncias, que podem a afectar 98% dos espa√ßos analisados no [estudo da Nature](https://www.publico.pt/2023/08/29/azul/noticia/crise-climatica-vai-dificultar-futuro-50-estacoes-esqui-europeias-2061549) caso a temperatura m√©dia global aumente 4¬∫C em rela√ß√£o aos n√≠veis pr√©-industriais. Segundo a [NBC News](https://www.nbcsports.com/olympics/news/alpine-skiing-climate-change-world-cup-schedule), uma carta assinada por 500 atletas de desportos da neve em Fevereiro pediu √† Federa√ß√£o Internacional de Esqui uma maior actua√ß√£o contra as altera√ß√µes clim√°ticas. Mais tarde, em Outubro, mais de 35 mil pessoas assinaram uma peti√ß√£o com o mesmo apelo. S√£o cr√≠ticas que chegam j√° depois de Gian Franco Kasper, presidente da Federa√ß√£o, ter sido demitido e substitu√≠do por Johan Eliasch que foi criticado por ser negacionista no que diz respeito √†s altera√ß√µes clim√°ticas causadas pelo homem. O autor da peti√ß√£o, Dom Winter, da Protect our Winters UK, defendeu que a redu√ß√£o do aquecimento global pode evitar o desaparecimento da neve nas est√¢ncias utilizadas para a pr√°tica de desporto ‚Äî embora se continue a correr o risco de se tornarem "elitistas". "Certamente que, com 2¬∫C [de aquecimento global], os resorts de altitude mais baixa estariam em grandes apuros. Ainda haver√° lugares com neve natural nos Alpes e os resorts em altitudes mais elevadas podem sobreviver. A preocupa√ß√£o √© qu√£o cara se pode tornar esta op√ß√£o", alertou, citado pelo [The Guardian](https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2023/dec/26/ski-resorts-battle-for-a-future-as-snow-declines-in-climate-crisis).

author: financialcontent.com
title: Netflix Sponsors Bigga$tate And Sip The Kid On Their Squid Games #181 Music Tour. | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
The tour flyer was inspired by Squid Games The Challenge's website for finding contestants that aired in the popular Netflix show and it features original promotional material used for Sip The Kid's debut on Netflix and Bigga$tate's Cartoon avatar adds a fun spin alongside all the sponsors and affiliates that helped make the tour possible, including Afroman will be performing alongside Bigga$tate and Sip The Kid will host all the events to remind everyone of Netflix as promotion. The partnership between Netflix, Squid Games, Deandre Smith also known as Sip The Kid and Jonathan Henderson also known as Bigga$tate comes as no surprise as both Creators of the Tour, have already been seen on Netflix for 2 Movies and Shows, especially Sip The Kid who has just recently aired in the "Squid Games The Challenge" that just had their season Finale Dec 7th. Bigga$tate will be the first musician in history to Curate and pitch a tour successfully to Netflix. From Squid Games The Experience to Podcasts and even Livestreaming to express how they feel after being on "Squid Games The Challenge." All participants on the popular Netflix show was given free reign to promote alongside Netflix any way they could come up with. But no one would have ever guessed that from a one time brainstorm between Sip The Kid and Bigga$tate, would come an idea that helped them both make history by creating a music tour around the most popular show on Netflix that has never added any music tours themed around Squid Games before.
With this being the first one ever, it has inspired St. Louis Cardinals to sponsor content and even attracted Afroman to perform alongside Bigga$tate who will add many events from his hometown in Chicago to bring back commercial opportunities to a city that brought even more opportunities to him. And ironically Sip The Kid's first movie role was in Chicago so they decided to add many dates from that city and Iowa, considering Sip The Kid's Hometown as well. There was no better addition for the Iowa roster part of the Tour than Tone Da Boss who has brought many events and joy to Iowa as a music label owner who is loved by his city enough to have a holiday given to him by the mayor.
The Creators of the tour decided to affiliate their Squid Games #181 Tour with this Win Tour. Bigga$tate will be performing his song with popular rapper Bobby Shmurda and Darrion Da Don another Chicago artist recruited by Bigga$tate for the tour from personally knowing how hard it is to change the narrative of being labeled a dangerous rapper just by where you're from or who you know, like he is often associated with Fbg Duck due to his relative but Darrion Da Don aims to leave a legacy for his daughter instead, by doing things like this with Netflix that helps the world see him for his craft and not just for the politics of his city. The Tour starts December 29th 2023.
 Squid Games #181 Music Tour

author: ÈªÑÁèä
title: New toad species discovered in south China's Guangdong- China.org.cn
text:
Chinese researchers have discovered a new horned toad species, which has been named Boulenophrys pepe, in Lianshan Bijiashan Nature Reserve in south China's Guangdong Province.
The research findings, led by Guangdong Polytechnic of Environmental Protection Engineering and other institutions, were published in a recent edition of the international academic journal Zootaxa.
The new species was discovered in evergreen broadleaf forests at altitudes of 490 to 540 meters, where mountain streams and a layer of leaf litter create diverse microhabitat systems.
The toad, notable for its swollen lips, differs significantly from closely related species in the same area, according to Lin Shishi, a member of the research team.
Lin noted that Boulenophrys pepe is highly sensitive to changes in the forest ecosystem. The discovery of this new toad species enhances the understanding of biodiversity and shows that China's conservation efforts to protect mountain forest ecosystems have been very effective, Lin said.
